SimplyCredit - Backend/Full-Stack Engineer - SF - Full Time

We are a VC-backed early stage fintech startup looking to fix lending.

We are looking for an experienced engineer eager for a defining role in building a company. As first engineer, you’ll get to call the shots on how to set up shop, help build out the team, guide product development, and write code that actually impacts people’s lives in a positive way. You’ll work directly with the founders and round out an early team with deep experience in data science, business development and consumer lending from their work at companies Kaggle and FICO. If you’re itching to build a new platform and want to make a mark on company culture, all while fixing consumer lending, then we’d love to hear from you!

Salary / Equity: $70K-$125K / 0.7%-3%

Apply telling us a little about yourself here - https://angel.co/simplycredit/jobs/58688-software-engineer

or email us at jobs@simplycredit.us
